item.title: New Rivers of the Atlantic
item.description: ‚ùñ This character was illustrated as a gift to my friend Qweezi. Happy Birthday! In Vekllei, you met all sorts of people. All nations passed through the Home Islands, some to visit, others to live. Tzipora met a great many of them in her time at school. Sydney came from Kosava, an anarchist island commune in the Lesser Antilles we know as St Kitts and Nevis. Kosava is an independent member-state of the Kalina Islands, which describes a series of autonomous islands in the Caribbean.
